title: Briam with tomato and olive halloumi
ingredients: ['800g potatoes, peeled and cut in 3mm rounds', '2 large courgettes, cut in 3mm rounds', '2 large red onions, peeled and cut in 3mm rounds', '14 plum tomatoes', '5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 garlic cloves, divided', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '40g chopped parsley', '1 packet halloumi cheese, cut in 4mm slices', '500g fresh spinach leaves', '12 green olives, stoned']
